title: How to hide the "Other Bookmarks" folder from the "Show Your Bookmarks" menu?
content: I am trying to hide this useless folder that I do not wish to see from the "Show Your Bookmarks" menu and the Bookmarks Manager. I was only able to find how to hide it from my bookmarks toolbar, which I already did.
creator: gsrgtrdg4565653

title: Out of nowhere, none of my Mac downloads activate
content:
I didn’t really have a topic choice that really fit for this. I can download files if I right click and ‘save link as’. However, If I click a download button it doesn’t trigger any sort of action. Nothing happens. It doesn’t even show any activity in the download tab of the browser.

I have not tried my PC yet, but will circle back after I give that a shot as well.
creator: hello172
